title: All Thought Bent on It (1U239)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Search. Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] Orc and 5 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each companion over 4.
Lore:	”'…for the Ring yearns, above all else, to return to the hand of its Master: they are one….'”
Rarity:	U
